overview: Wherein the teams and players that dominated the decade are recalled in their peak moments. The "Immaculate Reception", "Doomsday in the Dome", the "Over the Hill Gang", the "No Name Defense" and the "Steel Curtain" live on this splendid retrospective. Features Spectacular footage and the Team and Player of the Decade (the Steelers and O.J. Simpson). As usual, John Facenda's personable narration adds an exciting edge to the film.
tagline: Memories from Pro Football's Greatest Era
title: The Super Seventies
